template.line_2_html: I've just started using Hnry (who sort all my taxes for me), which means I need you to update my payment info on your end.

show.paragraph: This statement has been prepared using Income and Expenditure data held and maintained by Hnry (Australia) Pty Ltd on behalf of the named customer. The information declared is a true and accurate record of the self-employed income received via Hnry (Australia) Pty Ltd, and is unable to be amended or manipulated. This statement does not include any personal expenditure, household bills, existing personal liabilities, or other debts not known to Hnry (Australia) Pty Ltd.
show.payg_instalment_title: Pay As You Go Tax Instalment
show.title: Activity Statement
show.to_ato_main: (you need to pay this manually to the ATO as soon as possible)

edit.bas_confirmation: I confirm that the information presented is true and correct for the above date ranges and I give Hnry authorisation to lodge this with the ATO on my behalf.
edit.header_content: Please review your draft activity statement details below. After receiving your authorisation Hnry will lodge this statement on your behalf. Overdue lodgments may result in fines from the ATO.

gst_obligation.net_gst_tooltip: As a Hnry customer there should be no action or payment required by you for your GST. If there is, we will let you know shortly.
gst_obligation.title_tooltip: These totals are calculated from the income received and expenses raised during this period in Hnry.

payg_instalment_obligation.decreased: The PAYG instalment has been varied to ensure no payment is required by you now. This means some of the tax prepayments through Hnry have been allocated by the ATO towards your outstanding balance. The PAYG tax instalment below will be recognised in your %{fy_end_year} income tax return as tax already paid.
payg_instalment_obligation.decreased_html:
The PAYG instalment has been varied to ensure no payment is required by you now.

This means some of the tax prepayments through Hnry have been allocated by the ATO towards your outstanding balance. The PAYG tax instalment below will be recognised in your %{fy_end_year} income tax return as tax already paid.
payg_instalment_obligation.manual: These tax prepayments will be recognised in your %{fy_end_year} income tax return. This amount has been entered based on your discussions with our team.
payg_instalment_obligation.manual_html: These tax prepayments will be recognised in your %{fy_end_year} income tax return. This amount has been entered based on your discussions with our team.
payg_instalment_obligation.standard: This is the tax prepayments through Hnry for the quarter. These tax prepayments will be recognised in your %{fy_end_year} income tax return. There is no payment required.
payg_instalment_obligation.standard_html:
This is the tax prepayments through Hnry for the quarter. These tax prepayments will be recognised in your %{fy_end_year} income tax return.

There is no payment required.
payg_instalment_obligation.title_tooltip: Pay As You Go tax instalments are how any available tax prepayments made through Hnry are declared to the ATO.
payg_instalment_obligation.washup: This is the tax prepayments through Hnry for the quarter, along with any earlier prepayments from the financial year that haven't been included in a previous instalment. These tax prepayments will be recognised in your %{fy_end_year} income tax return. There is no payment required.
payg_instalment_obligation.washup_html:
This is the tax prepayments through Hnry for the quarter, along with any earlier prepayments from the financial year that haven't been included in a previous instalment.

These tax prepayments will be recognised in your %{fy_end_year} income tax return.

There is no payment required.
payg_instalment_obligation.zero: The PAYG instalment has been varied to $0 to ensure no payment is required by you now for PAYG tax instalments. This means the tax prepayments through Hnry this quarter have been allocated by the ATO towards your outstanding balance. The tax prepayments made this quarter will not be recognised in your %{fy_end_year} income tax return.
payg_instalment_obligation.zero_html:
The PAYG instalment has been varied to $0 to ensure no payment is required by you now for PAYG tax instalments.

This means the tax prepayments through Hnry this quarter have been allocated by the ATO towards your outstanding balance. The tax prepayments made this quarter will not be recognised in your %{fy_end_year} income tax return.

payg_withholding_obligation.title_tooltip: Pay As You Go withheld is only needed if you employ people to work for you. Please let us know if you donâ€™t employ staff. Please ensure this is within the below date range.

sick_leave.body: Everyone gets sick, but don't get caught out by unexpected bills whilst you're not earning. Set up a rainy day fund.

form.for_super_info: You may be eligible to claim a deduction for your personal super contributions. If youâ€™re eligible, youâ€™ll need to give your fund Notice of Intent. Learn more

index.empty_state_subheading: Allocate a portion of your income to your Super fund, a charity, savings accounts, investments and more!
index.intro_p1: By default all income after taxes and deductions will be transferred to your personal bank account. Use Allocations to automatically transfer portions of your income to any Australian bank account.

overview_banner.body: Take the reins of your financial journey by allocating a percentage of your income to an account of your choosing every time you get paid. Whether it's boosting your Superannuation, building your savings, fuelling your investment dreams, or supporting a charity close to your heart.
overview_banner.heading: Save like a pro with Allocations

select_template.default_caption: Create an Allocation to any local Bank Account, or select from one of our preset Allocations from our list below.

modal_form.depreciation_warning_p1: In accordance with ATO policy, the full cost of this item cannot be claimed in a single year and must be depreciated instead.

depreciating_assets.paragraph_1_html: Equipment and Vehicle purchases that are over $20,000 must be depreciated. You can read our article to learn more about asset depreciation.

form.client_reimbursement_notice_html: Client Reimbursements cannot also be raised as a Business Expense. See this article for more details.
form.mileage_eoyf_text: ATO rules specify you can only claim Motor Vehicle expenses using either the Logbook method or the Cents per Km method - but not both. By selecting this category, you wonâ€™t be able to raise any expenses in the other Motor Vehicle expense category for the remainder of this Financial Year.
form.mileage_text: ATO rules specify you can only claim Motor Vehicle expenses using either the Logbook method or the Cents per Km method - but not both. By selecting this category, you wonâ€™t be able to raise any expenses in the other Motor Vehicle expense category for the remainder of this Financial Year.
form.motor_vehicle_text: ATO rules specify you can only claim Motor Vehicle expenses using either the Logbook method or the Cents per Km method - but not both. By selecting this category, you wonâ€™t be able to raise any expenses in the other Motor Vehicle expense category for the remainder of this Financial Year.

index.intro_october_html: We've made some changes to Expenses! Please see here for more info.

rejection_accept_modal.reject_acceptance_terms: I accept full liability for this expense and want Hnry to claim this for me
rejection_accept_modal.warning_text: This expense has been declined as it is not claimable according to ATO policy. By resubmitting this expense, you are accepting full liability and, in the event of an ATO audit, you will be required to provide proof of the validity of this claim.

just_under.p1_html: We have noticed the amount you have claimed for this category is now in excess of what others in the same industry are claiming. Please continue to raise your expenses however, be aware that the ATO may require additional documentation to support the expenses you have claimed.
just_under.p2_html: If you have any concerns please get in touch with the team.

over.p1_html: We have noticed the amount you have claimed for this category is now in excess of what others in your industry are claiming. You may still submit this but please be aware that this may flag you for further review by the ATO once your Income Tax return is lodged. In this case, the ATO will need to be satisfied that all expenses you have claimed were legitimately required for your business.
over.p2_html: If you have any concerns please get in touch with the team.

table.delete_filed: Cannot be deleted because this expense has already been lodged in ATO. Please get in touch with the team if it is no longer valid.

au.prefill_refreshing: Fetching your data from the ATO, one moment please...

lump_sum_arrears_payments.lump_sum_e_para_1_html: Lump Sum E payments are back payments of your employment income - for example, pay that you've received now for work done in previous years.
lump_sum_arrears_payments.lump_sum_e_para_2: Your employer should give you documentation showing which year or years the payment relates to.
lump_sum_arrears_payments.lump_sum_e_para_3: Please enter the year(s) and the amount earned in each year, based on what your employer has told you.
lump_sum_arrears_payments.lump_sum_e_para_4_html: You can find more information about Lump Sum E payments here.

private_health_insurance_details.content: Private patient hospital cover is provided by registered health insurers for hospital treatment provided in an Australian hospital. General cover, commonly known as 'extras', is not private patient hospital cover. Please refer to your Health Insurance statement for confirmation of your coverage.

hnry.p1: I understand Hnry makes every effort to prepare my tax return accurately and correctly, and I accept that Hnry relies on me to disclose all relevant information. I understand that the information I am submitting is considered final and complete, and will be used to lodge my Income Tax Return. If the information I have provided is later deemed to be incorrect, there may be a one-off fee for the Hnry Expert Services team to amend my Income Tax Return.
hnry.title: Hnry

final_checks_modal.intercom_html: If these details are incorrect, message through to our team here.

lodgement_declaration.p2: All of the information I have provided to the tax agent for the preparation of this Income Tax Return, including any applicable schedules, is true and correct;
lodgement_declaration.p3: I authorise the agent to give this document to the Australian Taxation Office.
lodgement_declaration.title: Lodgement declaration

privacy.p1: The ATO is authorised by the Taxation Administration Act 1953 to request your tax file number (TFN). We will use your TFN to identify you in our records. It is not an offence not to provide your TFN. However, you cannot lodge your income tax form electronically if you do not quote your TFN. Taxation law authorises the ATO to collect information and to disclose it to other government agencies. For information about your privacy go to ato.gov.au/privacy.
privacy.title: Privacy

refund_bank_account.p1: If you are due a refund from the ATO, this will be paid into your personal bank account listed in Hnry.
refund_bank_account.title: Refund bank account

substantiation_declaration.p1: I have declared all my assessable income from all sources, in and out of Australia, including capital gains received, for the year of income in my tax return.
substantiation_declaration.p2: I am aware that to claim a work-related, business or other expense deduction I must demonstrate that I have incurred the expense for income producing purposes. Where expenses are used for both business/work-related and private purposes I have kept appropriate apportionment records to verify my business usage claim.
substantiation_declaration.p3: I am aware of the need to substantiate or verify any income or expense item declared in my tax return and I will be able to produce such information to the satisfaction of the ATO in an audit situation. I understand that penalties, interest and possible legal action may be applied if incorrect income or claims are identified by an audit.
substantiation_declaration.p4: I further understand that if the return is not lodged by the due date specified, penalties may apply.
substantiation_declaration.title: Substantiation declaration

definition.paragraph_3: although not legally married to you, lived with you on a genuine domestic basis in a relationship as a couple.

spouse_income.super_lump_sum_amount: Total taxed element, where the tax rate is zero

full.TAX_CODE_A: You are a single adult on 30 June.
full.TAX_CODE_B: You are a single adult on 30 June and you have a dependent child or children.
full.TAX_CODE_C: You have a spouse on 30 June (including if your spouse died during the tax year and you did not have another spouse before 30 June).
full.TAX_CODE_D: You have a spouse on 30 June and they have agreed that you should claim their share of the rebate because they aren't claiming it themselves.
full.TAX_CODE_E: You have a spouse on 30 June and you have agreed that they should claim your share of the rebate because you aren't going to claim it yourself.
full.TAX_CODE_F: You are covered as a dependent child on a private health insurance policy and are not entitled to receive the rebate.

win_message_modals.modal_1_paragraph_html:
From the team at Hnry, congratulations on a fantastic year. Thank you for the support and letting us help you with your taxes.

We look forward to continue helping you for the year ahead.
win_message_modals.modal_2_paragraph: This can take 4-6 weeks for the ATO to approve the lodgement. We will notify you of the outcome as soon as it has been processed at their end. Any refund owed to you will be paid directly into the personal bank account you have recorded in Hnry.
win_message_modals.modal_2_title_html:
We will now lodge your Income
Tax Return (ITR) with the ATO.
win_message_modals.modal_3_paragraph: This will likely result in your Income Tax Return needing to be relodged, at an additional cost (and/or you possibly needing to return your refund to the ATO).
win_message_modals.modal_3_title: Please do not submit anything directly to the ATO yourself.

activity_statement_processing_banner.paragraph: Thank you for submitting your activity statement. Annual Review forms for your Income Tax Return will be available on your dashboard after your activity statement has been finalised by the ATO.
activity_statement_processing_banner.title: Your activity statement is currently being processed

activity_statements.agro_title: Your activity statement review for the period end %{date} is now overdue âš ï¸
activity_statements.due_date_approaching_paragraph_html: Please review and confirm your activity statement now. The ATO deadline of %{due_date} is approaching and we require your confirmation prior to lodging. Overdue lodgments may result in fines.
activity_statements.note_html: Note: This is not your Income Tax Return. Annual Review forms for your Income Tax Return will be sent after ATO data is finalised.
activity_statements.overdue_paragraph: Please review and confirm your activity statement now. Confirmation is required before we lodge this with the ATO and overdue lodgments may result in fines.
activity_statements.paragraph_html: We need you to review and confirm your activity statement details before the %{due_date} in order to ensure we can lodge this with the ATO by the deadline. Overdue lodgments may result in fines.
activity_statements.period_ending_june_html: Please review and confirm your activity statement for the period ending %{period_end_date} by %{due_date}, so we can lodge it with the ATO by the deadline. Late submissions may incur penalties.
activity_statements.title: Review your activity statement for the period ending %{date}

filing_obligation_coming_soon.content_html: We're getting ready to lodge your Income Tax Return (ITR), but we just need the %{tax_agency} to finalise all their information before we can send it to you for review. Please do not lodge your own tax return.

filing_obligation_submitted.paragraph: Thank you for submitting your %{financial_year} annual review! It'll be processed within approximately 4-6 weeks from the date we received it. So for now, just sit back and relax, we've got it from here!
filing_obligation_submitted.title: It's time to sit back and relax!

filing_obligations.description: Your Annual Review form is ready for review! Please double-check your income and expense details (just 5 minutes!), make sure everything is correct, then sit back and we will lodge your Income Tax Return. You can save and come back later if needed.

index.business_expenses_savings: Business Expenses work to reduce the amount of Income Tax (and GST) you need to pay. Make sure to raise your Business Expenses using the correct categories and we will calculate the Claimable Amount for you.

client_payment_modal.success_alert: Your payment should arrive in your personal bank account within standard bank processing times.

multiple_clients_modal.disclaimer: Please note that you only need to assign a payment to multiple clients if some have GST included, and others do not.
multiple_clients_modal.instruction: To make sure this payment is processed correctly, please include each client's name and the amount they paid.

invoice_quotes.business_number_prompt: Otherwise you've indicated you're GST registered, but have not provided your ABN

invoices.convenience_fee: Credit card payments incur a %{surcharge}% convenience fee to cover the costs of processing charged by our provider Tyro.

has_salary_income.tooltip: Income tax paid for employees who earn a wage or salary (this applies to you if you get annual leave, sick leave and superannuation contributions from your employer)

has_self_employed_income.tooltip: ATO's definition of self-employed refers to anyone who conducts business activity on their own â€“ as a freelancer, contractor, sole trader, or small business owner â€“ rather than in a more traditional employer relationship. Anyone earning self-employed income is required to complete a tax return at the end of the financial year.

prior_expenses_this_year.accountant: I used accounting software, e.g Xero, MYOB
prior_expenses_this_year.manual: I did it myself, e.g via a spreadsheet, bank statements

consent_to_act_agreement.authority_to_act: I grant Hnry the Authority to Act on my behalf

choose_an_id_document.authority_to_verify_identity: I confirm that I am authorised to provide the personal details presented and I consent to my information being passed to and checked with the document issuer, official record holder, a credit bureau and authorised parties for the purpose of verifying my identity and address.

confirm_your_income.income_tax_message_average: Based on others in your field of work, your starting tax rates, according to the ATO, are shown below. After your first few pays, Hnry will automatically adjust your tax rate based on your earnings.
confirm_your_income.income_tax_message_estimate: Based on your estimated income, your starting tax rates, according to the ATO, are shown below. After your first few pays, Hnry will automatically adjust your tax rate based on your earnings.
confirm_your_income.income_tax_percentage_tooltip_paragraph_: If you have other sources of income (e.g. Salary or Casual job), your self-employed income will be taxed at a secondary rate. This is to ensure you have no tax owing at the end of the financial year.

step_titles.where_to_pay_you: We want to show you how Hnry works with $1 free! Tell us where to pay you?

verify_your_identity.duplicate_user_html: These details are already linked to a Hnry account. Contact %{support_email} if you think this is an error.
verify_your_identity.full_year_tax_resident_prompt: Have you been a tax resident of Australia for all of the current financial year?

tooltip.content: You can find your tax file number on letters and statements from ATO, in the myGov online portal, or on payslips from past employers.

working_holiday.question: Are you on a Working Holiday Maker visa (subclass 417) or a Work and Holiday visa (subclass 462)?

where_to_pay_you.helper_text: Donâ€™t worry - we will never have access to your bank account or its data, we just need this so we can pay you your income.
where_to_pay_you.paragraph_1: We need your bank details in order to pay you once weâ€™ve calculated and deducted your taxes.

income_tax_tooltip.text: Please note that as you have received Salary income this financial year, this will impact the tax rate required for your self-employed income. The higher rate is to ensure you have no tax owing at the end of the financial year. Itâ€™s important that your other sources of income information is kept up to date.

payslip.international_fee_tooltip: Any international payments will incur a %{fee} fee to cover the cost of processing charged by our payments partner.

levies_tooltip.text: The Medicare Levy is paid by all taxpayers. This is different from the end of year â€˜Medicare Levy Surchargeâ€™, which you may be exempt from if you meet certain criteria.

payslip.sales_tax_undercollected: GST owed directly to ATO by you

superannuation_guarantee_tooltip.text: The superannuation guarantee (SG) is the percentage of your ordinary time earnings (in addition to your wages) paid into your super fund by your employer.

show.deductions_info: Want to know more about how Hnry calculates your tax rate and other deductions?

index.intro_html:
Use this section to tell us about any expenses you have from prior to joining us (excluding any expenses you have already uploaded to Hnry).

You should enter the total amount for each Expense category per month.

N.B. Given that Hnry will not be reviewing receipts for these expenses, we are unable to warrant the validity of Expenses raised in this section. You will need to ensure you hold onto the receipts should they be required by the Australian Tax Office. If you would like us to review and approve any expenses then you should raise these in the system as individual claims instead.

If you're not sure what is claimable, check our Guide to Claiming Business Expenses.
index.title: Pre-Hnry Expenses

show.business_expense_auto_claim_comment: We have automatically claimed this as a business expense for you.
show.hnry_fee_comment: The Hnry fee shown in your pay summary is GST exclusive, this is because the GST relief is applied when the payment is processed.

invite_friends.paragraph_1: For every person who joins Hnry using your promo code, you'll both get $25 credit on your Hnry account when they start using the service. ðŸŽ‰

sole_director.disclaimer_p1: This Statement of Account has been prepared based on the information held and maintained by %{company_name} on behalf of the named proprietary limited company (Pty Ltd). The information declared is a true and accurate record of the business income received via %{company_name} and cannot be amended or manipulated. This statement excludes any personal expenditure of directors or shareholders, non-business-related expenses, existing company liabilities, or other financial obligations not known to %{company_name}.

form.gst_type_warning_paragraph_2_html: If you are unsure if your services are exempt, the ATO have more information. Learn more
form.taxable_income_tooltip: GST is passed to the ATO and is not included in your income. This is the amount that will have tax deducted.

fields.salary_income: Annual Salary or Casual job income

account_number.invalid_error: Invalid account number, should be 6-9 digits
account_number.label: Account number

bank_transactions.notice: If you want to edit your Supplier details, you'll need to make these changes from the Clients and Suppliers page .

form.adjust_tax_rate_col_1_html: Please note that we are only able to increase your tax rate to cover any income tax owing for your prior self-employed income. The maximum we will increase your rate to is %{rate}% so you may still have a balance owing at end of financial year if the top rate is not enough to catch you up on the shortfall.
form.adjust_tax_rate_col_2_html: IMPORTANT: We are unable to increase your tax rate to account for any Medicare amount so you will need to pay those directly when the amounts are due.
form.adjust_tax_rate_col_2_student_loan_html: IMPORTANT: We are unable to increase your tax rate to account for any Medicare and student loan amounts so you will need to pay those directly when the amounts are due.

tooltip.content: Your TFN number is on letters and statements from ATO, in the ATO online portal, in online banking, or on payslips from past employers.

business_registration.feedback_yes_html: Unfortunately the Hnry service is only for ABN Sole Traders in Australia and is not designed to cater for Pty Limited Companies. If you are trading as a Pty Limited Company and would like to speak to our team about your options, please click here.

sales_tax_exempt.paragraph_1: Is this Client outside Australia or are Services for this Client exempt from GST?
sales_tax_exempt.tooltip_html:
By choosing 'Yes', GST will not be charged for services done for this client. Only certain services are exempt from GST. You will be liable if GST shouldâ€™ve been charged.

If your client is outside of Australia, please read our International payments guide.

salary_income.paragraph_1: Salary or Casual income is where your taxes are taken care of by your employer. We need to know this so we can calculate your tax rate accurately.

sales_tax_registration.paragraph_1: You'll need to register if your self-employed income exceeds $75,000/year, or if you're an Uber/taxi driver.
sales_tax_registration.paragraph_2: If you are registered for GST, we'll lodge your BAS for you at no extra cost.
sales_tax_registration.paragraph_3: If you're not registered for GST, our team can register you or will let you know if you need to be in future!

business_number.label: My ABN
business_number.title: ABN format is 11 digits with optional spaces e.g. 12 345 678 901
business_number.tooltip: As a sole trader, having an ABN is optional. If you have one and you add it here, it will appear on your Invoices and Quotes.

has_sales_tax_exempt_services.label: Some of the goods/services I sell are GST free
has_sales_tax_exempt_services.tooltip: Only certain services are GST free. You will be liable if GST should've been charged. Please get in touch with the team if you have GST free services.

part_time.label: On average, I work less than 30 hours per week
part_time.tooltip: Working less than 30 hours per week means you are considered to be working part time

sales_tax_registered.label: I am currently registered for GST as an individual

locked.content: If you need to change your GST Status please get in touch with the Hnry team.

not_locked.content: If you earn more than $75,000/year of self-employed income, you must be registered for Goods & Services Tax (GST) as per the ATO's legislation.

student_loan.label: I have a Student Loan/Trade Support Loan

locked.content: If you no longer have a Student Loan then you need to get in contact with the Hnry team.

not_locked.content: If you have a student loan we may need to deduct additional tax amounts to cover Student Loan repayments.

faster_payments_radio.paragraph_1: Opt in for fast payments and get your money sooner!
faster_payments_radio.title: How fast do you want to get paid?
faster_payments_radio.true_info_text: Less than 24 hours from receiving your payment - weâ€™ll raise the 50c fee as an expense for you!
faster_payments_radio.true_label: Lightning fast payments (additional 50c per Payment Summary)

faster_payments_toggle.tooltip_html:
For 50c per Payment Summary, net funds are sent to your personal bank account faster than standard AU bank processing times. This doesn't apply to your Allocations you have set up, or any International payments from outside Australia.

We'll send $0.01 to your bank account to test if it supports faster payments.

gst_registered_warning_modal.tell_clients_and_recruiters: You may only select this option if you are trading under an ABN. ï»¿If you are unsure if you have an ABN, please get in touch with the Hnry team.

intro.intro_p1: Use the sections below to tell us about your financial information. We need to know your tax details like your TFN and GST registration, as well as the bank account you would like to be paid into.
